item.title: Healing spells?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Corruptive”]Is this posible and if so heres what the spell looks like i want to change

if(magicID == 12901) {// Heal Rush if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 56) { stillgfx(373, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(17); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

I already changed the name thx for help![/quote]
If this spell doesn’t do damge, just heal; then you have to start by getting rid of anything to do with causing damage in the spell.

So take out:

			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(17);

And

	        addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic);

Now all you have to do is add the healing part.

Read full topic
